text: Welcome to 18454 Clifftop Way, a unique ocean view listing on a cul-de-sac in the highly coveted Sunset Mesa neighborhood . This flat, build-ready lot boasts nearly 6, 000 square feet, presenting a rare opportunity to construct your dream home with breathtaking 180 degree ocean vistas extending from Santa Monica to Palos Verdes and Catalina, plus the Santa Monica Mountains. The lot is on one of the Mesa's rare flat streets. This configuration not only offers easy access for construction vehicles but is great for walking and biking. Electrical utilities are already underground. The neighborhood is one of the most cherished on the Westside of Los Angeles, located just up the hill from the iconic Getty Villa. Close to Malibu, Santa Monica, and the Palisades it has access to the Malibu-Santa Monica School District. Experience the tranquility and prestige of Malibu living, all while being a short drive from vibrant city life. Don't miss out on this prime location to build the ocean view home you've always envisioned. Phase 1 was completed by the EPA and Phase 2 debris removal has been completed by a private contractor hired by the Seller. There are CC&R's in Sunset Mesa. Ocean views are protected.

Preeminent year round sunset views of the horizon and mountains, this home is nestled within one of Malibus most exclusive gated enclaves, bordered by protected parkland, this estate offers unparalleled privacy in a peaceful setting within two minutes to PCH. This home features soaring ceilings, custom white oak floors, and an architectural open staircase, all illuminated by expansive floor-to-ceiling windows and skylights. Every space is bathed in natural light, creating a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor living. The grand main level, boasts two living rooms, a family room, a formal dining room, and a chefs kitchen with an oversized island and two eat-in areas. These exquisite spaces flow effortlessly to a 2, 000 sq ft wraparound deck, meticulously tiled and designed to frame stunning views of the pool, gardens, and the breathtaking horizon. A private library/office with bespoke built-ins and a guest suite with an adjacent bath complete this level.The homes six luxurious bedrooms and seven baths include five ensuite retreats, four of which feature their own private balconies with inspiring views. The primary suite is a sanctuary, with its own fireplace, a sprawling, oversized private balcony, dual spa-like baths, and bespoke walk-in closets and floor to ceiling windows that showcase the stunning sunsets. The upper level also offers a media roomcurrently a refined executive officeand an adjoining family lounge separated by striking 10-ft glass doors. The estate's grounds are a sanctuary of tranquility, featuring a resort-caliber pool and spa with an expansive pool deck perfect for hosting gatherings. Hidden gardens, including a Zen bamboo retreat with a built-in gas firepit, provide peaceful escapes. The estate also includes orchards, vegetable gardens, a rose garden, and multiple serene sitting areas, all surrounded by lush parkland, a grassy play area and an enclosed pet area. The Pinnacle of Modern Luxury-This turn-key compound boasts state-of-the-art technology, including automated blinds, custom blackout drapery, a wireless sound system, hard-wired security cameras, multi-zone Nest climate control, and a home alarm system. A three-car garage features dedicated Tesla and Porsche chargers, while the entire structure is steel-reinforced for modern seismic stability.Nestled within one of Malibus most exclusive gated enclaves, bordered by protected parkland, unparalleled privacy in a peaceful setting without having to climb any Malibu canyons.

text: Property was sold off market. Listing was uploaded to MLS for comparable sales purposes. Build the private compound of your dreams in one of Malibu's best neighborhoods! With over 1 acre of usable land and unobstructed ocean views, this premier lot in Malibu Park will be sold with permits ready to issue for a private estate designed by Colega Architects. Situated on the southern side of Cuthbert, the property boasts panoramic views of the ocean, islands, and surrounding Santa Monica Mountains. The ~6, 000 square foot compound is an exemplary mid-century modern with impressive volumes and the perfect blend of grand rooms to entertain and private retreats to recharge and rejuvenate. A central great room flows seamlessly from a living area to a dining area and into an open-concept kitchen, featuring a massive island, breakfast bar, and a fully equipped butler's pantry. The primary suite is situated at the southernmost point of the home and includes an ocean-view bedroom with outdoor access and a spa-like bathroom with dual vanities, a soaking tub, and access to a private courtyard. There are three additional en-suite bedrooms, plus a family room and office. Designed for seamless indoor/outdoor living, the plans offer a plethora of beautiful outdoor spaces, with a massive half-covered sun deck connecting the living areas to a pool/spa, a built-in cold plunge, a grassy lawn, a rooftop deck with a gas fire pit, and more. The home totals ~4, 521 square feet of living space and an attached~540 sq. ft. two-car garage. The sale also includes plans for a detached ADU of ~1, 200 sq. ft. that is nearly ready to submit, complete with underlying geology documents and a location with setbacks compliant with the City's regulations. This home is moments from both Zuma Canyon and the Backbone trail network, providing endless miles for hiking, mountain biking, and horseback riding. Malibu Park offers the perfect blend of luxury and serenity in a rural setting, minutes from the sand and surf at Zuma Beach, highly-ranked schools, markets, restaurants, and more. With the costly process of planning and achieving permits already completed, this is a rare opportunity to build a private compound in one of Malibu's most idyllic neighborhoods. Permits are pending and the lot will be delivered fully entitled at the close of escrow with permits ready to issue.

text: One-of-a-kind opportunity to own an iconic, Architectural Digest-featured property in the exclusive community of Paradise Cove. This jewel of a bungalow is more than just a home: It's a bespoke piece of art that blends sophisticated design with cozy beachside living. Meticulously redesigned by acclaimed interior designer Amy Kehoe with highest-end features and the utmost attention to detail, the bespoke retreat is a testament to both charm and functionality. Tucked into the coveted lower bowl of Paradise Cove, the home offers incredible curb appeal thanks to the luxe, deep-burgundy Farrow and Ball Brinjal paint that wraps the exterior - a hint at the stunning touches and sleek vignettes you'll find both inside and out. Step through the elegant front door and find a serene living space flooded with natural light thanks to the oversized windows and skylights. Wide-plant engineered pine floors and shiplap walls create a bright and airy ambiance, and custom furnishings and fabrics provide both style and efficiency. The kitchen is beautifully anchored by a perfectly-proportioned BlueStar range and milky-stone countertops shot through with emerald veining that evoke the sea just moments away. Innovative space-maximizing features are everywhere, from the stowaway storage to the custom-built furnishings by Waka Waka and Green River Project. A chic curtain of Susan Deliss fabric welcomes you into the bedroom, a serene retreat enveloped in Idarica Gazzoni's Tree of Life wallpaper, with custom-built nightstands and luxurious finishes. The showstopper of a bathroom - featuring floor-to-ceiling blush-pink Zellige tiles, vintage glass sconces, and Waterworks fittings - is a serene sanctuary-within-a-sanctuary. French doors open from the bedroom onto a peaceful, private outdoor oasis complete with an inviting built-in nook for relaxation or entertaining. The property is offered fully-furnished (including a top-of-the-line golf cart), with each piece having been hand-selected to complement this extraordinary home's design aesthetic. Equally exceptional is the idyllic community of Paradise Cove, where residents enjoy gated security for peace of mind, tennis and basketball courts, a large clubhouse for group gatherings overlooking the ocean, a playground, and - of course - access to world-famous Paradise Cove Beach. Truly a showpiece of impeccable style, this property's timeless beauty speaks for itself and offers a unique turnkey solution for anyone seeking a stylish coastal retreat and access to one of Malibu's most storied communities.

The laundry room is conveniently located at the end of the hallway with two washers and dryers, plus access to the front yard.T he primary suite is a private retreat with vaulted ceilings, built-in shelving, a fireplace, and glass doors opening to the pool and ocean views. The large walk-in closet features custom built-ins, while the en-suite primary bath offers a freestanding tub, double sinks, a makeup vanity, a walk-in shower, a private water closet with bidet, and ocean views. text: One of Southern California's most desirable addresses, this Cape Cod contemporary comprises a main residence and two guest houses with spectacular views and abundant space for indoor-outdoor living and entertaining. Set behind gates, the oceanfront compound has tall, wood plank ceilings, extra large windows, and wide doorways opening to tranquil patios, lawns, and beachfront decks on two levels. In the main house, a light-filled great room with wood floors includes a spacious living area with a fireplace, a bar area, and a top-of-the-line island kitchen that will serve as the hub of any gathering. Extending from one side of the living room, the dining room has glass doors on two sides, one opening to a grand dining pavilion and the other to a private lawn and garden, also accessible from the living room. From this lawn, steps lead up to a wide beachfront deck furnished for relaxing and stargazing, with a hot tub, comfortable couches, a fire pit, a day bed, and steps to the sand. The views are sensational, from Point Dume to Palos Verdes, with island and ocean and gorgeous sunsets. The home has three bedrooms on the main floor, one, en-suite, currently used as a gym. Upstairs, the primary suite is a private getaway, with vaulted, beamed ceilings, a huge sitting area, a spa-style bath, and a floor-to-ceiling wall of glass that overlooks the lower deck and opens onto an upper-level oceanfront deck with majestic views. Separated from the main residence by a large lawn, the two guest houses are toward the front of the property. One has a living room, full kitchen, bathroom, and two bedrooms, plus a patio area with a sauna and firepit. Nearby is an additional structure that could be used as a yoga room, art studio, gym, or storage area. The second guest house is a large studio suite with vaulted ceilings, huge windows, ocean views, skylight, kitchenette, living and dining area, and a wraparound architectural sunroom. The home has covered parking for two cars, complete with a 220v plug, plus guest parking for five additional vehicles, as well as room for surfboards and other beach equipment. This is a wonderful, welcoming oceanfront home with vacation style and year-round comfort.

Nestled within a tranquil and picturesque setting, this exceptional estate harmoniously blends European-inspired craftsmanship with modern luxury. Thoughtfully curated details and exquisite finishes define the home's unparalleled sophistication, creating a residence that is both timeless and inviting.Every room exudes character, beginning with the entryway, where reclaimed Belgian bluestone brick tile and a stately reclaimed door with sidelights from an English country estate set the tone. The custom iron handrail and Urban Electric light fixtures complete the welcoming ambiance. Inside, premium Duchateau hardwood floors and Portola Roman Clay plaster finishes lend warmth and texture, while bespoke paneled doors, coffered ceilings, and cabinetry with hardware imported from France and England elevate every space.The heart of the home, the chef's kitchen, showcases a stunning Le Cornue French range and double oven, complemented by professional Miele and Gaggenau appliances. Calacatta Viola marble countertops, a custom solid oak butcher block island, and an integrated marble apron-front sink combine functionality with elegance. Handmade English porcelain pendant lights and a custom-built oak buffet add artisanal touches, while a spacious pantry with under-cabinet lighting ensures convenience.The adjacent dining room, framed by Pierre Frey linen drapery, features a coffered ceiling and a vintage Murano glass chandelier from Italy, embodying refined charm. Nearby, the formal living room boasts a reclaimed antique French limestone fireplace mantel, solid oak built-ins, and a Lindsey Adelman custom light fixture, making it the perfect space to gather. The family room offers a more relaxed yet equally luxurious atmosphere, with vaulted ceilings, painted beams, and another reclaimed French limestone fireplace. A built-in bench at the bay window provides a serene view of the meticulously landscaped gardens.Upstairs, the primary suite is a private retreat. Vaulted ceilings with painted paneling and a sliding door to a balcony with peek-a-boo views create a sense of serenity. The en-suite bathroom, a spa-like sanctuary, features a steam shower with handmade zellige tiles, integrated marble sinks, and bespoke oak vanities. Brass mirrors by Martin DeWinter and an early Poul Henningsen copper ceiling lamp from 1926 complete the space, blending classic artistry with modern convenience.Guest accommodations continue the theme of thoughtful luxury, with paneled ceilings, French drapery, and en-suite bathrooms featuring reclaimed materials, Waterworks plumbing fixtures, and Italian marble accents. One guest suite enchants with a princess balcony framed by custom ironwork, while another offers painted paneling, built-in cabinetry, and direct balcony access.The exterior is equally remarkable, designed for both recreation and relaxation. An outdoor kitchen features an Italian gas or wood-burning pizza oven, a professional BBQ, and a beverage fridge, complemented by a dining pergola and lounge area. Recreational amenities include a tennis court, bocce court, and fire pit, while the edible gardens, chicken coop, and water-wise landscaping emphasize sustainability. Mature trees, low-voltage lighting, and a multi-zone irrigation system complete this enchanting outdoor oasis.This estate is a rare combination of timeless design, bespoke artistry, and modern functionality, offering a one-of-a-kind living experience for the discerning buyer.

text: Own one of Malibu's finest and last remaining mountain-top ocean view estates! Sited on over 12 private acres, with soaring jetliner & ocean views, experience the serenity of this gated compound with full LA county stamped plans for a 5, 000+ SF residence and guest suite. Developers: Take advantage of the massive upside and build a spec estate on this existing footprint with full LA county approved plans, designed by FAME Architecture & Design. This residence has received approvals for square footage, building volume, and building height from the Los Angeles County Planning Department, exempting it from the restrictions of the Santa Monica Mountains Local Implementation Program, which limits hilltop construction in the area. This presents a rare opportunity to build a home on one of the last remaining developable hilltops in Malibu. The design of the residence fully embraces the dramatic ocean views to the southwest, the vast expanse of skies overhead, and the encircling mountains by thoughtfully dispersing the main house, guest house, garage, and pool across the landscape. These elements are seamlessly linked by walkways that align with the ocean vista, creating a strong connection between the home and its stunning natural surroundings. As you approach the home, a concrete wall floats above the foyer, creating a sense of intrigue by balancing concealment and revelation. Meanwhile, a bronze grid delicately frames the sky above and once inside, leads you to the second-floor primary suite. A covered walkway guides visitors from the guest house to the rear fire pit and deck, offering a moment to appreciate the untamed eastern landscape. Perched dramatically at the cliff's edge, the pool is set apart from the rear deck of the main house, heightening the sense of exclusivity and immersion in the landscape. At the heart of the home, curved glass walls define the living and dining rooms, seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor spaces as they flow into the expansive deck with its panoramic views. Every aspect of the site planning and architecture is orchestrated to elongate movement across the terrain, amplifying the natural beauty of the environment. Simple yet elegant geometries overlap and intersect, creating a structure that feels both sculptural and monumental, yet remains humbly subservient to the natural landscape. Working septic is in place alongside a well, water and utility hookups. Final approval of a Woosley Fire Exemption and permit has been granted, expediting the path to build and saving years of time. Majestic scenery abounds including 360 degree canyon and mountain views with some of the most breathtaking ocean vistas in all of Malibu; quite possibly the most peaceful retreat available today in Western Malibu. This Woolsey fire rebuild project offers the opportunity to build more than 5, 000 interior SF across two different structures. Additionally, a flat concrete pad perfect for creating a Pickleball, basketball or tennis court, sits farther down on the property. This estate is an ideal choice for entertaining. Create your absolute dream home and live the Malibu lifestyle to the finest! Approved plans available upon request!

An architectural masterpiece. One of the most iconic properties on the California coast. The Wave House is the design of visionary architect Harry Gesner. Offered for sale for the first time in nearly 36 years. An avid surfer throughout his life, Gesner famously designed the house to emulate cresting waves. The house was completed in 1963 and exudes a mid-century modern aesthetic throughout emphasizing open space and natural light. Tucked into a hidden cove in Western Malibu, the home commands majestic views of the ocean waves, distant islands and surrounding landscape. The residence has two distinct parts. Three enormous oceanfront vaulted public rooms and a stunning beachfront primary suite with hot tub and sauna, plus a five-bedroom upper level that stretches the width of the property to offer ocean views from nearly every room. Architectural elements include enormous beams, wood-plank ceilings rest above hardwood floors and walls of glass with ocean beyond. Perhaps the most distinctive design theme is a series of overlapping circles. Three wraparound decks echo the shape of the incoming surf. The sunken conversation pit swirls around its central fireplace. Even the shape of the hand-cut copper shingles that cover the roof resemble the scales of a fish. A separate garage/guest house structure offers additional bedrooms. Providing the very essence of coastal living, the home features an expansive, landscaped entry patio, plus wide, semicircular decks for dining, entertaining, lounging, and sea and stargazing. Shown only to prequalified buyers.

text: Enjoy incomparable ocean views from daybreak to twilight in one of Point Dume Club's most beautiful waterfront homes. Watch the lights of Palos Verdes twinkle on, the first wisps of the marine layer creep up the canyons, and the amber hues of the setting sun reflect off the wings of the red-tailed hawk that's a daily, eye-level visitor. You're away from it all. On top of the world. Ensconced in luxury and solitude, yet only 14 minutes from PCH or the Calabasas Commons. A flex space perfect for a home office or nursery, dedicated laundry room, and luxurious primary bath with steam shower and freestanding tub featuring Moen & Brizo fixtures, complete this unparalleled at-home getaway. While you'll want for nothing in this trophy home that has it all, the homeowner has future-proofed the home with thoughtful upgrades and preparations for expansion. The roof framing, with a Polyglass Polyfresko torchdown finish, was built to accommodate future solar panel installation. The HVAC ducting has been replaced, with a dual-zone system and dedicated 3-ton unit for the top floor alone. Welcome to 6930 Dume Drive, a stunning Spanish masterpiece nestled in the prestigious Point Dume enclave, known for its luxurious beachside living and extraordinary real estate. The estate's Mediterranean-inspired architecture, originally envisioned by Doug Burdge AIA, has been masterfully reimagined by Lady Michael McCraine, who has also expertly updated the interiors, resulting in a sophisticated and polished retreat. Upon entering through the private gates and winding down a tree-canopied driveway, you'll discover a sanctuary designed for the discerning entertainer. The meticulously curated floor plan seamlessly integrates a northern living wing and a southern sleeping wing, united by a striking entry and an opulent living room that overlooks the pristine swimming pool, spa, tennis court, fire pit lounge, and the majestic Pacific Ocean beyond. Spanning an impressive 7, 683 square feet, this extraordinary residence features 6 bedrooms and 5.5 baths within the main house, 3 wood-burning fireplaces, and a luxurious chef's kitchen with La Cornue range and Calacatta Turquoise marble sourced from the esteemed Breccia Capraia quarry in Italy. The sleeping wing comprises 4 bedrooms on the lower level, while the upstairs primary suite boasts spacious his and her closets, a lavish bathroom bathed in natural light from the 20-foot ceilings and two skylights, and a private deck, perfect for embracing the sunrise of a new day. This wing seamlessly unites the exquisite kitchen, dining room, and welcoming family areas with a charming loft-style office, embellished with a fireplace and private deck, offering an ideal sanctuary for contemplation and creativity while basking in ocean views. Moreover, the sixth bedroom and bath, intelligently designed with a separate entrance for increased privacy, are flawlessly integrated into this refined arrangement. The estate's two distinct guest homes artfully strike the perfect equilibrium between privacy and accessibility, offering versatile options. The garden guesthouse features a living room and separate en suite bedroom, while the tennis casita currently serves as a massage studio and gym. The much-loved and esteemed front yard serves as a versatile oasis for a range of activities, be it perfecting soccer, archery, or badminton techniques, delighting in the playset, unwinding on the lush green grass, or meditating on the deck amidst the eucalyptus grove, where the gentle rustling of leaves creates a soothing ambience, all encircled by towering 50-foot trees. Embark on an odyssey to the zenith of serene living at 6930 Dume Drive, where captivating ocean views, impeccable design, golden sunlight, and an abundance of amenities coalesce in a symphony of sophistication. Seize this rare opportunity to own one of Malibu's most distinguished homes and let it become the canvas for your own personal sanctuary.

Positioned at the heart of luxury, its proximity to global icon Nobu, the stylish Soho House, and the emblematic Malibu Pier and Surfrider Beach embodies the pinnacle of resort-style living. This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom haven sprawls across a generous 1, 200 sq. ft., with a welcoming formal entry leading into a vast living and dining expanse crowned by a cozy fireplace. The seamless integration of expansive glass sliders reveals a covered balcony, setting the stage for awe-inspiring ocean views and the inviting beach and pool below.

Located in the special enclave of Sunset Mesa, a sublime 4 bedroom 1964 mid-century with ocean views is yours to acquire. Utmost privacy is achieved by a gated, spacious grassy lawn elevated from the street. Modern double glass doors lead to an open entryway, dining room and kitchen, and features a sight line of the Pacific. Kitchen accoutrements include Thermador appliances and a stainless steel farmhouse sink. A wide hallway connects to the living room with seating in front of the travertine fireplace as well as facing the rear garden, a perfect setting for entertaining, enhanced by elegant landscaping, ocean & mountain views. The newly restored oak floors throughout lends a contiguous flow to the public and private spaces. The primary bedroom opens to the garden where you can soak in a bubbling Jacuzi and watch the sunset. Smart features abound. A separate laundry room leads to the attached 2-car garage. This turnkey property is just minutes to a swim at the beach, hiking trails and the nearby communities of Pacific Palisades and Santa Monica.

Malibu Colony! Located within the desirable Malibu Colony gated community, on a sandy section of Malibu Colony beach, a rare offering is on the market for the first time in nearly 20 years. With its beach front pool and shabby chic decor, this charming Cape Cod offers the ultimate Malibu experience. Be it a vacation destination or year-round retreat, this five-bedroom residence provides serene, seaside accommodations that instantly capture your emotions. The open floor plan offers several sitting areas to entertain, dine, relax or watch TV. The charming kitchen allows the home or visiting chef to work their magic in an inviting environment. The generous primary suite pleasantly pampers with its two sitting areas, office area, spectacular ocean views, spacious bath and walk-in closet. Visiting family or guests can enjoy the privacy of separate bedrooms connected by a common sitting area. The large third level guest suite has skylights and impressive space for lounging away from the central entertaining hub of the home. Entertain friends or relax on the spacious, Saltillo-tiled beach front patio, complete with dining and lounging areas or relax inside the Spanish tile accented pool. Experience the ultimate Malibu Colony lifestyle in this Malibu Colony gem.

Experience the finest Malibu living in this rarely available and beautifully upgraded upper-level entertainer's delight in one of the most sought-after neighborhoods. This gorgeous condo features an open concept living room with crown molding, recessed lighting and newer double paned doors and windows along with a gorgeous and modern fireplace for entertaining. The chef's kitchen with sealed concrete kitchen countertops, stainless-steel backsplash throughout and ample counterspace is enough to make the most discerning chefs jealous. Very spacious master bedroom with a large custom walk-in features a heavenly bathroom with dual vanity sinks and sealed concrete counter tops. The second bedroom soaks the natural light in and features a spacious closet with bathroom. Underground parking with 2 car tandem parking is includes. Only minutes away from Zuma Beach and shopping this gorgeous home shows stunning!

The moment you step into the Big Dog Beach House you'll be awed by the expansive ocean views and open living and dining spaces with a beautiful kitchen oriented for the stunning beach views. The downstairs living room has a built-in entertainment cabinet and wet bar, plus a one-of-a-kind handmade seashell gas fireplace surround. Wooden ceilings, recessed lighting and hardwood floors give the space warmth and charm. The entry, dining room, and kitchen floors are covered in tile chosen for it's old world beach aesthetic and practicality. Throw open the Fleetwood sliding glass doors and take in the soothing sea breezes! The kitchen has charming European backsplash tiles, Viking range and French door double oven with two dish drawers, built-in microwave, and Sub-Zero refrigerator. Upstairs, the primary bedroom boasts a private deck, elevated fireplace and wood details. You'll enter the primary bath past two walk-in closets and a sauna as well as a privacy shower and soaking tub. Double sinks and natural lighting beckon. The secondary bedroom can easily be used as an office and/or den and has its own deck as well. The versatile third bedroom can also serve as a den, work-out room or guest bedroom. Each bedroom has it's own spacious bathroom. Exit the back door and grab a towel and a beverage to go downstairs to the expansive entertainment deck. Lighting and state-of-the-art heaters make this area fun year-round. There's plenty of storage behind the wooden doors and an outdoor privacy shower once you've come up from the beach! Located a few minutes away from the Malibu Pier and Santa Monica!

Set amidst an acre of gardens, this charming home has all the privacy of a country estate set in the convenient heart of Point Dume. Built on a single level with soaring, beamed ceilings and enormous windows, the garden property is beautifully detailed inside and out. Hand-chiseled hickory floors, Ann Sacks tiles, and exceptionally comfortable furnishings create a lovely setting for tranquil living and lively indoor-outdoor entertaining. Off the foyer, the light-filled, double-height living/dining great room, with a large fireplace, opens to a large flagstone patio through three sets of folding glass doors topped by clerestory windows. The patio, surrounded by flower beds, fountain, and lawn, has a large fireplace and is furnished for al fresco dining and casual lounging. Adjacent to the dining room, the chef's kitchen features soapstone countertops, an island topped with Carrera marble, top-quality appliances, a breakfast bar, desk space, abundant cabinets, a farmhouse sink, and an additional refrigerator and freezer drawers. The spacious family room, with a wall of shelving and a large flatscreen, is roomy enough for large gatherings and cozy enough for quiet escape. A hallway off the living room leads to a wing with an office with a built-in desk and a window seat, plus three bedrooms. Here, the primary suite is gorgeous and charming, with a sunroom that opens onto the backyard, a walk-in closet, and a large tiled bath with dual vanities. The grounds of this enchanting home suggest relaxing strolls, long naps, and bucolic entertaining. The back patio has an outdoor kitchen complete with Lynx barbecue and bluestone counter bar. At one edge of the lawn is a small flower bed and a curved bench built of massive stones. From the patio, a flagstone path extends past rose beds to a footbridge that leads to a huge irrigated flower, vegetable, and herb garden complete with raised beds, chicken coop, garden sheds, a bench, and productive 15 types of fruit trees, which include citrus, apricot, mulberry, and pomegranate trees. Throughout this gated property, hedges and mature trees emphasize privacy. The home has a two-car garage, with a gym setup, plus additional guest parking. Equipped with security, built-in sound, radiant heat, heated outdoor shower, and a variety of smart-home features, this non-toxic home is a peaceful sanctuary in one of Southern California's most desirable communities.

Folonis. Encompassing a fire-resistant design concept, this Woolsey Fire rebuild offers views of the Pacific Ocean near Point Dume that were not previously possible. The design includes all-electric solar panels, high-efficiency heat-pump systems controlling the four temperature zones of the house, hybrid electric water that is provided instantly to all fixtures, and a kitchen that is equipped with an advanced induction cooktop. The architects delineated a simple palette and designed the kitchen and bedroom wing to be wrapped in Douglas Fir panels, providing visual warmth to the living areas. Amenities such as built-in seating, interior planters, storage space, and acoustic separation between the two primary suites are an example of the level of detail this crafted home provides. The architectural plans reflect a 3, 009 SF house comprising 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, a two-car garage measuring 660 SF, one covered overhang totaling 172 SF, and a detached exterior shed adding an additional 120 SF of enclosed space. Offering the quintessential Malibu lifestyle, this tranquil property is moments away from riding and hiking trails, world-renowned beaches, chique boutiques, and farm-to-table dining.

In the courtyard, there's a detached wine cellar tower made of hand-laid stone with a climate-controlled wine fridge, powder room, and a bonus room on the second level perfect for an office or studio. This property is ideally situated minutes from sandy beaches, local markets, and schools. Don't miss your chance to purchase an extraordinary custom home in one of Malibu's most coveted neighborhoods.

Harmony, grace, and unrivaled ocean and island views define this inspired Mediterranean villa created for grand indoor-outdoor entertaining. Set behind gates on more than five acres, the property is superbly crafted and gorgeously appointed inside and out. Complete with a guest house and dual owner's suites, the residence combines traditional details, such as vaulted ceilings, soffit lighting, and travertine floors, with an updated open layout, elevator, built-in sound system, and expansive use of glass. The property is fully permitted and ready to build a tennis court. The grand chandelier foyer reveals the home's sophisticated elegance, with panoramic ocean views that are enjoyed by almost every room. Step down to the majestic living room, complete with a huge fireplace and extra-wide glass doors that open to a wraparound view balcony. The adjacent dining room shares the balcony and ocean views, while the spacious family room has French doors onto the front yard. The enormous kitchen would impress any chef, with dark green granite countertops, a large island with seating and built-ins, dual appliances of exceptional quality, and a pantry room.A hallway off the kitchen has a full bath as well as an en-suite bedroom with ocean views. From the foyer, the home's other wing features an ocean-view office, a two-tiered movie theater, and three more en-suite bedrooms. A laundry room and two powder rooms complete the main floor. The upper level, accessed by elevator or the wide central staircase, comprises two exquisite ocean-view owner's suites, each with vaulted ceilings, hand-scraped walnut floors, fireplace, sitting area, balcony, huge custom closets, and a total of three lavish spa-style bathrooms. The estate's manicured grounds with a new sprinkler system, mature trees, and fruit orchards feature an ocean-view infinity pool and spa, generous patio space for dining and entertaining, and an outdoor kitchen, and seating area. A separate one-bedroom, one-bath guest house is near the home's entry and the three-car garage. There is additional parking for more than a dozen cars. This is a legacy estate of spectacular character and quality. All the A/C units in the main house are new. The home music system and speakers are new. The appraised House SF is 10, 689, the Guest House SF is 312.

text: With 80 feet of beach frontage, non-stop sunrise-to-sunset ocean and island views, and magnificent, open interiors, this Carbon Beach contemporary is both private refuge and luxurious gathering place. Four separate decks and vanishing walls of glass define a lifestyle of relaxed elegance just steps from the sand. The ever-changing vistas take in a wave-fringed panorama from Point Dume to the Malibu Pier to the sparkling lights of the Queen's Necklace. A gated entry opens into a spacious, palm-lined courtyard leading to the glass front door, which offers a first tantalizing view of the ocean. Within, tranquil, ocean-view spaces are luminous with Portuguese limestone floors, wide windows, and the serene illumination of an enormous atrium skylight. With gorgeous built-in wood cabinetry and gallery walls suitable for a museum-quality art collection, the indoor-outdoor living room opens seamlessly to a full-width beachfront deck complete with ceramic tile floors, al fresco dining area, ample seating, Lynx barbecue center, and built-in tiled hot tub. Inside, the spectacular entertaining space features a fireplace, a wet bar, a conversation lounge, and a beautiful dining area that opens into an interior garden courtyard. The adjacent kitchen is equipped for the professional chef, with generous wood cabinets, granite countertops, an island with bar seating, soffit lighting, a chandelier breakfast area, and sliding doors to the oceanfront deck. Also on the home's main level are two en-suite bedrooms, one currently serving as a gym, plus a powder room. On the upper floor, accessible by stairs or elevator and arrayed around a mezzanine-style walkway beneath the atrium skylight, there are three oceanfront suites, each with a view balcony, and a laundry room with a dog-washing station. The primary suite is a serene retreat with fireplace, large walk-in closet, spa-style bath, and a separate office with sink and beverage cooler. The home has numerous smart-home features, including three-zone air conditioning, security, central vacuum, water filtration, and more. There is garage parking for three vehicles, with a second washer dryer in the garage, plus additional guest parking in the front courtyard. Located on one of Southern California's most desirable stretches of coastline, this stunning architectural residence is both contemporary and timeless.

This Marmol Radziner home in Paradise Cove is the ultimate coastal retreat, blending luxury and modern simplicity in one of Malibu's most sought-after locations. Situated at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac, this is one of the most private lots in all of Paradise Cove with no immediate neighbors. Rustic barn wood adorns the exterior and a large push gate opens to a sanctuary surrounded by mature trees, drought-resistant succulents, and meticulously designed spaces. Inside, the home is appointed with James Perse furniture which is included in the sale. The living room boasts vaulted wood-beamed ceilings with a long center skylight, floor-to-ceiling windows, and stacking glass doors that connect to a wraparound Ipe wood deck. Casual living spaces gently lead to a dining area and well-equipped kitchen with a Thermador gas range, stainless steel appliances, and a breakfast bar. The spa-like bathroom features marble floors, a soaking tub, shower with a bench, dual vanities, and a water closet with a bidet. The primary bedroom overlooks the backyard and has a walk-in closet, vaulted wood ceilings, and corner sliding doors opening to a peaceful oasis. The backyard is completely enclosed and private with a large Ipe sun deck, outdoor dining area, gas fire pit, and bubbling fountain. At the rear of the property, there is a detached room that could be utilized as a guest bedroom, office, den, fitness/yoga studio, and more. Additional features include an outdoor shower, an included Polaris golf cart with gated parking, and a laundry area with a sink. The property offers extremely low space rent and easy beach access to some of Malibu's most beautiful sandy beaches, coves, and surf. Perfectly designed in one of Malibu's most exclusive beachside communities, this is a truly rare opportunity.

Imagine arriving home to an entry walkway that beckons you to slow down and reconnect with nature as you are greeted by ocean vistas and majestic stone outcroppings. This re-centering of yourself into the natural environment was a driving element of the homes design. The sweeping views of Santa Monica Bay, Catalina and the Queens Necklace can be enjoyed from the main rooms on the entry floor including the primary bedroom with en suite bath, living room with fireplace, dining room with access to the wrap around deck and kitchen with butcher block counters. Down the spiral staircase are two additional bedrooms, bathroom and Sauna. A patio off the Lower floor bedrooms provides another secluded spot to enjoy the stunning panoramic vistas. This Mid Century property has been in the same family since 1979. Never offered for lease or sale before.

Perched on a hill overlooking the Pacific Ocean and the Santa Monica Mountains, with breathtaking panoramic views in all directions, this peaceful sanctuary is situated on a private road in Western Malibu. The upper level of the house includes a large open living room/dining area with vaulted ceilings, a kitchen with a breakfast nook and walk-in pantry, and a large master bedroom with en-suite bathroom including a shower and a separate jacuzzi tub. There is also a second bedroom with its own bathroom and shower. The lower level, which can be used as a second living space or guest unit, includes a large bedroom with a full en-suite bathroom, and a large living room with a wet bar (sink, beverage refrigerator and cabinetry), laundry closet, and a sliding door leading to an outside shower. True indoor/outdoor living, with floor to ceiling windows and sliding doors in all rooms, and a large wrap-around porch offering easy access to the gardens that surround the house, with hundreds of hand-planted California native plants, cactus and succulents, plus a self-sustaining koi pond., on a full acre of land. The Malibu Chumash Indian Chief likely put his Teepee on this Lot to enjoy the amazing Malibu Ocean/Coastline views and to watch the shooting stars at night crash into the ocean . Park Rangers have always opened the gate for the owner when he wanted to drive up Zuma Motorway ( park trail/road) to his lot . . Have the most fun ever viewing a Malibu Lot! No reports or studies on this land .. Come to this property and just let your imagination go wild and get inspired.

If the past three years have taught us anything, it's that life is short, and we need to make the most of every day. So how about this one...You wake up early at Longview to an unobstructed view of the Pacific. While lingering in bed to enjoy your coffee and email, you check out the waves at Surfrider, then grab your board for some world class shredding. Or maybe you'd prefer to head across the street for an ocean-view hike or jump on your bike to play tennis at The Racquet Club or swim laps at The Pepperdine Crest Club. When you're maxed out on endorphins, you slip into your private spa and watch the red-tailed hawks circle above, take a little nap, swinging in your outdoor hanging bed, do some work in your private hillside office or make a quick run to the farmers' market for locally grown produce and honey. Before you know, it's time for dinner at Nobu or Lucky's or dancing the night away at Soho House. At the end of the night, you fall asleep to the music of the waves as you try to figure out the difference between your real life and dreams. If this scenario sounds tempting, add to it, panoramic ocean views that include Catalina by day and the queen's necklace by night; three-quarters of an acre of exotic specimen trees, a spa bath and chef's kitchen, 2 fountains, 3 fire places, a fire pit, an enormous deck and exterior kitchen for large scale entertaining, all in a private setting that's less than five minutes from Malibu's shops and restaurants and only 20 minutes from town. There's a reason a car, a rum, even a Barbie are named for the Malibu lifestyle. So, ask yourself...if not now, when?

text: Amazing Malibu mountain retreat property for those wanting a home surrounded by nature with land for recreation and privacy! This magical property is just under 4 mostly flat acres and enjoys breathtaking views of the Santa Monica Mountains. The chic, A-frame home, has been recently updated and is a perfect balance of warm modern esthetic with beautiful high ceilings, custom cabinetry, fresh white walls and tile details. The chef's kitchen with Fisher & Paykel range, stainless steel appliances, quartz counters and huge butcher block island, opens up to the large dining and living areas. Outdoors you will also find a pergola, covered entertaining deck areas, prefab studio/guest room, a large fabulous chicken coop and fully enclosed vegetable garden with raised planter beds, and a sand sports field. Plenty of storage on the property, as there is a large custom built shed with additional covered area for your mountain bikes, as well as a storage container on the property. On land offered for sale for the first time in a decade, this nearly-new ocean-view home has the look and feel of a Mediterranean retreat. Sited behind gates on a view knoll of over 2.5 acres, the property is beautifully landscaped and meticulously designed for impressive indoor-outdoor recreation and entertaining. High ceilings with rough-hewn beams, spectacular chandeliers, arched windows and doorways, and stone tile floors highlight luminous rooms that are both formal and welcoming.A domed foyer with a gorgeous tile rug opens to the homes main living area, a grand-scale great room with living, dining, and kitchen areas. The living area is flanked by a large fireplace on one side, a wet bar on the other and four sets of French doors opening to patios and gardens. The dining area has three more sets of French doors leading to an ocean-view deck, while the beautiful chef's kitchen is fully equipped with a chandelier island, separate breakfast bar, large pantry, quartz marble countertops, quality appliances, and striking tilework.In addition to a powder room and laundry room, there are four en-suite bedrooms on the main floor, including a private and elegant owners retreat, complete with stone-mantel fireplace, dual closets, spacious spa-style bath, and three sets of French doors to an ocean-view deck area.On the homes lower level is an impressive wine cellar and wine tasting room with high ceilings and a wall of built-in wine racks; an office/bedroom; a fully equipped, carpeted movie theater; a full bath; and a guest bedroom with mountain and ocean views.The property offers an inviting variety of outdoor spaces for relaxation and entertaining. From the front door, a path meanders through flowering plants and palms to a pergola-shaded ocean-view patio with comfortable seating. The very private backyard has a similar pergola, with hanging lamps and an area for poolside outdoor dining. A huge rock waterfall spills into the Pebble Tec pool that is solar heated, and a smaller waterfall runs into the tile-decorated spa. There is a firepit with a tiled bench, a covered outdoor kitchen, and barbecue with lovely tile work and bar seating, and a playground area with swings, slides, and a sandbox. There is also a vegetable garden and productive lemon trees. In addition, there is a large Electric Solar System with battery backup, Home LP Generator, sprinkler and fire hose protection system. There is a three-car garage, ample guest parking is available in the private motor court at the front of the house.An exquisite and expansive residence of exceptional quality.

text: On a cliffside perch situated in the chic Malibu enclave of Big Rock, this 1958 Mid-Century is anything but just modern and sterile. It's not often that an estate of such stature - with both a pool and tennis court - comes on the market at this price on Point Dume. A well-designed open floor plan distinguishes public spaces on the entry level, from spacious family quarters on the lower level. Patios on both floors lookout to a saltwater pool, spa and cabana, pond, lighted tennis court, and fruit orchard. The airy main level is impressive: Cantera entry doors, high beamed ceilings, arched entries, large windows, richly hued hardwood and tile flooring, and three cozy wood-burning fireplaces. The motor court has ingress, egress, and pedestrian gates, as well as space for additional parking and a 3-car garage with room for bikes, boards & toys. Just around the corner is access to the beaches, surfing, hiking, and the Nature Preserve overlook with 180-degree ocean views for those hoping to spot dolphins, seals, and whales. Also, Point Dume, one of Malibu's most popular neighborhoods, is home to the award-winning Malibu Elementary school, along with stores & restaurants close by. This wonderful estate has it all.

text: Sleek lines, soaring ceilings, ocean views, and extensive use of natural wood and stone characterize this dramatic central Malibu architectural residence designed by Ellis Gelman. Gated and private, the approximately two-acre property features a family room and bedrooms on the ground floor, while the living, dining, and kitchen areas are located on the second story, with wraparound windows and a massive deck, which maximize the home's breathtaking ocean views. There is a powder room on this level, plus steps that lead up to a loft office with a row of north-facing skylight windows and another large porthole window that welcomes the sunrise. The four bedrooms and three full bathrooms on the lower level include a serene primary suite, complete with ocean views, fireplace, huge custom closet, and beautifully appointed spa-style bath. This level also includes a family room/media room/office with an attractive kitchenette, a wall of built-in cabinets, and a walk-in closet. At the front of the house, the long drive leads to a two-car garage, plus an adjacent guest apartment/office/gym with large windows, ocean views, and a full bath. The roomy front and back yards offer mature trees, a view patio, a lavender/rose garden, and ample space for guest parking and a swimming pool. With view decks and generous space for indoor/outdoor entertaining and recreation, this Malibu compound is a tranquil, inviting retreat.

Oceanfront Condo in Malibu! Who needs Netflix when you have the Pacific Ocean? Have it all in this mostly furnished condo on Las Flores Beach. Enter the front door, kick off your city shoes and travel down the bamboo wood hallway straight to the private balcony with an endless view of the sparkling ocean. Sip on a glass of prosecco as you watch the sea lions, dolphins, whales and pelicans go by. The kitchen in this one bedroom, one bathroom condo, features maple cabinets and stone countertops, and opens to the living room with bamboo wood flooring, sleeper sofa and large sliding glass door with that breathtaking view. Escape to your quiet oasis in the large bedroom with an oversized closet. Slip on your flip flops, head out the door down the stairs to the beach that is easily accessible to residents, take a dip, a stroll or just soak up the California sunshine. End your day back on the balcony to watch the sunset colors in the sky, and listen to the sound of the surf. The wonder continues through the night with ocean lighting from under the balcony. This condo is located in the highly desirable eastern Malibu area, between Moonshadows and Duke's restaurants, and just ten minutes to Santa Monica. You will appreciate the secure building with a key code entry system. This unit comfortably sleeps four and comes with two tandem parking spots, and a storage cabinet. Rarely do you get the opportunity to buy a piece of Malibu history like this Carbon Beach triplex. Built in the 1940's this was one of the first homes built within a 1/4 mile of the Malibu Pier and legendary Surfrider Beach. Sitting on appx. 50 ft of wide lot, this home has retained all the original charm and is located on Malibu's most prestigious long dry sandy beach and less than a mile to the center of Malibu where you have numerous restaurants, coffee shops, super markets and shopping. Currently the home has the original 3 separate units with an expansive patio in the center. On the right is the large 2 bedroom apartment with ocean front living & dining room leading out to the ocean front private deck and the common area deck to the right. To the left are two separate units with one above the other, both overlooking the ocean & common area deck. This is the first time on the market in 50 years and is truly a property whose history is as special as the property itself.

A delightful contemporary beach home located on the landside of prestigious Broad Beach Rd in Malibu. The ample patio features a built in barbecue with outdoor burners for year round entertaining with friends and loved ones. All three bedrooms offer comfortable and inviting respites to relax after a long day at the beach. Adjacent to the home's entry, there is a generous and private area for hosting a party or creating your outdoor living room. Sophisticated gardens surround the home and include a flat grassy lawn and a raised viewing deck showcasing a peak of ocean vista. Conveniently located near access to one of Malibu's most desirable beach destinations.

A blufftop masterpiece, this Point Dume mid-century modern estate commands spectacular ocean and Catalina Island views from the area's most desirable street. With gorgeous sight lines and extensive use of hardwoods and glass, the open-plan living areas flow seamlessly to beautifully manicured grounds for luxurious living and majestic entertaining. A celebrity pedigree, exceptional privacy, dual owner's suites, media room, infinity pool, and stairs to the sandy beach distinguish this remarkable property. The gated entry opens to a beautifully landscaped drive complete with sports court and a charming dining patio. The large pivoting front door opens onto a flagstone-floor landing that steps down to a magnificent great room comprising living, dining, and kitchen areas with stunning views out to the pool, patio, and ocean. With gently sloped beamed ceilings, skylights, hardwood floors, and walls of glass flanking two sides, the living area features a dramatic stone and metal fireplace wall, sleek contemporary cabinetry, and views that are shared by the huge open dining area and the adjacent kitchen. The kitchen, up two steps from the living area, has heated flagstone floors, an island, bar seating, top-quality appliances, a desk area, extensive storage, a butler's pantry, and an enormous built-in breakfast/dining nook with a beautiful table, upholstered seating, and wraparound windows that open to the pool deck just outside. Off the living area, at the front of the house, is a spacious media room complete with with beverage and wine coolers and built-in cabinets. Doors from this room open to the scenic front patio. Another hallway steps down to a bedroom wing where the three bedrooms include the main-floor owner's suite. This lovely ocean-view retreat has a curved wall with many windows and wide glass doors opening onto a relaxing patio area that looks toward the views and the pool deck. There are generous built-ins, dual closets, and a lavish spa-style bath with heated floors. Across the main living area, off the kitchen, is an additional ocean-view bedroom and bathroom. On the home's upper floor is a spacious ocean-view deck with ample room for dining and lounging and two en-suite bedrooms, including the second owner's suite. This room has a built-in desk, a luxurious bath, and doors to a private balcony that overlooks the pool, yard, and spectacular vistas of the ocean, islands, and sparkling Queen's Necklace. The extraordinary backyard is terraced and meticulously landscaped to take full advantage of the property's views, privacy, and multiple options for intimate and expansive entertaining. Arrayed around the pool and central patio and multi-level deck, there are separate areas for al fresco dining, an outdoor living room, barbecue center, firepit with built-in seating, lawns, and inviting places for whale watching, stargazing, and taking in the gorgeous white water views. There is an outdoor shower and a gated stairway to the wide, sandy beach at Dume Cove. Designed for tranquil relaxation and gracious entertaining, this architectural estate is a peaceful sanctuary on one of Southern California's most desirable stretches of shoreline.

Ample sized second guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom with granite counter tops. Lower-level features spacious large family room with bar area that's great for entertaining. Lower level also features an ensuite bedroom with walk-in closet, a separate laundry room and an attached oversized garage with additional storage area. Additional features include two-zoned HVAC, an additional detached two-car garage with pull through and additional storage space and already purchased rights to use the private guard gated lower Rambla Pacifico gate making it less than a mile to the property from PCH compared to 4 mile drive up Las Flores. Amazing opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind property with spectacular views and just minutes to the beach!

Sensational mountaintop Architectural retreat with the best views in Malibu. Breathtaking vistas of the entire Santa Monica Bay all the way to downtown LA and out to Catalina Island. A glass entry door leads to the foyer then into the gourmet kitchen with stainless steel countertops and maple cabinetry. The kitchen is open to a high-ceilinged living room that features sliding walls of glass leading out to a cantilevered balcony with incredible views. Adjacent to the kitchen is a dining area with equally stunning views including the entire Queen's Necklace at night. On the same level is the primary bedroom also with amazing views, a limestone bathroom and an expansive entertainment room with office nook and rows of built-in cabinets and bookshelves plus second story loft - perfect as another office or third bedroom. On the lower level is a guest bedroom carved into the hillside with its own limestone bath and steam shower, plus an outdoor firepit and pool bath with al fresco tub. A few steps away is the gorgeous black pebble stone pool and an expansive ocean view deck cantilevered over incredible boulder formations. Other amenities include: a 14 kW solar panel system, electric vehicle charging station, laundry room and plenty of storage. All set behind gates on 1.6 private acres in the coveted Saddle Peak community.

text: Truly extraordinary, cannot be reproduced, one-of-a-kind architectural, located on two separate legal parcels on a private road with 130 feet of beach frontage. This spacious and luxurious residence commands coastline, island, and ocean views from Point Dume to Palos Verdes. With the visionary design of international architect Chad Oppenheim along with Doug Burdges office providing local architecture planning, the sleek structure is a study in serenity: Venetian plaster, rift sawn white oak, enormous vanishing pocket doors, Navona travertine floors, and a generous open layout for effortless indoor-outdoor living and entertaining. The three levels are served by an elevator as well as a stunning illuminated spiral staircase with the elegance of a nautilus shell. Gated and very private, the homes main entrance is set in a tranquil landscaped courtyard, with the large pivoting glass front door offering the first of many striking sightlines. The main floor comprises an open living, dining, and kitchen area with high rift sawn oak ceilings and absolutely remarkable views from wraparound windows and doors that open seamlessly to the oceanfront deck and patio. The two-level living area features a fireplace, gallery walls, and two large seating areas, one open to the ocean, the other open to a very private outdoor garden living room with a 20-foot-long fireplace and a large Italian-marble fountain. The dining area is open to the deck, where there is additional seating and ample room for entertaining and al fresco dining. There are two kitchens: one adjacent to the dining area, with a long island, bar seating, beautiful oak cabinets, and Wolf and Miele appliances, the other up a few steps, equipped for the most ambitious gourmet entertaining with another range, dual ovens and dishwashers, and pantry cabinets. A beautiful Italian travertine powder room and an indoor/outdoor shower room complete the main floor. On the upper floor, there is another living room, this one with a glass ceiling and wood beams. A wall of glass at one end of the room opens to a large outdoor living area with sparkling ocean views. The four en-suite ocean-view bedrooms on this level, all with beautiful rift sawn oak floors, ceilings, and cabinets, include two sensational owners suites with sitting areas, custom closets, and magnificent spa-style travertine bathrooms. The lowest level is home to a temperature-controlled wine storage display wall, a fully- equipped media room, plus a laundry room and powder room. The property has room for a guest house (under construction) or additional home and an oceanfront swimming pool next to an expansive lawn and 100-year-old Olive Grove. There is a two-car garage with guest parking for 14 cars and the property is beautifully landscaped, with drip irrigation, landscape lighting, steps to the beach, palms, and century-old olive trees. Smart-home features include camera security, automated shades, and multizone air conditioning. This is truly a remarkable beach estate for a lifestyle of uncommon luxury.Includes 27234 PCH - APN# 4460-028-016 and 27242 PCH - APN# 4460-028-003.

Welcome home to this unique Malibu property with incredible ocean views. This three-story custom-built home features the white shores of Zuma beach from every balcony and even the living space. As you enter the home you are instantly greeted by the blue ocean water straight through the sliding glass doors. The main floor features vaulted wood beamed ceilings, freshly painted interior, and brand-new vinyl flooring. The open concept floorplan allows the natural sunlight to shine throughout the home. The kitchen is very spacious, has newer appliances, and freshly painted cabinetry. You can envision cooking breakfast every morning with the sounds of the waves right in front of you. The kitchen also showcases a breakfast bar, built-in desk, and a large pantry with plenty of storage. An additional full bathroom is right by the garage which is great for early morning surf sessions so you don't need to worry about tracking sand through the home! Right off of the main living area is a formal home office, however, it can instantly be converted to a main floor bedroom. As you make your way downstairs you will find the master suite which features brand new carpet., extra-large bedroom, oversized master bath and a walk-in closet that will you giddy! Downstairs is also a room with extra storage and was built with climate control for wine cellar use, and the full laundry room. There is also another room which was used as a home gym but can also be used as another home office, recording studio, or even a fun art studio. Off of the master suite is a full sunroom. This is fantastic as a private sitting area or as we virtually staged, it makes a great indoor-outdoor gym. The third floor is a large loft with spectacular views and is great place for a pool table and a fun lounge. Two additional bedrooms, one full bath and two balconies can all be found on the third floor. The gorgeous garden is green and lush and frequently has beautiful parrots visiting in the early afternoon. There is plenty of room to add a pool and multiple social areas. The uniqueness of this property is that the lot is divided into two lots. The home sits on about 15, 000 sqft while the other lot sits on the other side of the driveway. There is about 30, 000 sqft which is currently empty. Please reach out to us to discuss all the wonderful possibilities that await you with the extra lot! The vinyl dual pane windows and sliding glass doors in the home have a double life time warranty, which is transferable to the new owners. The home is South facing and was designed as a passive solar home with 2x6 fully insulated construction. The exterior of the home is covered with fire resistant stucco with metal covered trim as well as masonry deck coverings. The home is also plumbed with a manual exterior roof fire sprinkler system, which can be fed by city water or from a dedicated 750 gallon water storage tank and powered by a 7500 kW propane generator and pressured controlled lift pump.

text: Over the decades, Malibu has earned a reputation as a quintessential beach town known for sandy beaches, surf-friendly waves, and dramatic sunsets. At the end of a gated drive in the rolling wooded hills not far from this stretch of legendary coastline, this secluded, secure 1.86-acre estate is a rare, exceedingly private oasis offering a four-bedroom residence, a repurposed barn, a gym, a bocce court, a paddock, and a charming Airstream. The ground is strewn with stately mature trees, established landscaping, and colorful flowering plants. The home features a light-filled living room with hardwood floors, a beamed ceiling, a brick fireplace, and numerous wide windows; a dining room with a wall of glass overlooking and opening to a swath of emerald lawn; a bright eat-in kitchen with superior stainless-steel appliances; a bar area with a wine chiller; bedrooms with built-ins, lofty beamed ceilings, and doors to the property; and baths with both contemporary and vintage fixtures and finishes including a claw-foot soaking tub. Just outside are a sitting area in the shade of tall mature trees, a fire pit in the midst of a lush lawn, swings hanging from sturdy tree branches, and a hot tub in a cloistered grove of trees. Beside the property's versatile equestrian paddock are a vine-covered pavilion and a sports court. The spacious gym boasts a mirrored wall and top-of-the-line equipment; the building also includes a casual media or family room with a wall of built-in storage. The delightful Airstream sleeps four and offers a kitchen, bath, and shower. The cleverly repurposed, stylishly appointed, and the versatile barn is perfect for day-to-day living and dining as well as festive entertaining. It features striking hardwood floors, a towering ceiling with eye-catching beams, space for billiards, an open kitchen with an oversized island, a bar, a lounging and media area, and a covered porch. The loft above is a peaceful bedroom with a rugged wood wall, treetop views, and an en suite bath with a roomy glass-walled shower and distinctive sink carved from stone.

Gorgeous updated townhome on desirable top-row of Malibu Villas! Professionally designed upgrades throughout, enhancing the endless OCEAN views!! Enter mid- level and take floating stairs up to the light and bright great-room featuring soaring ceilings and walls of glass to enjoy the panoramic horizon and seascape. A bonus loft ready for your creative imagination and needs can be a 3rd bedroom/office/yoga-meditation room and has tree top views and it's own private bathroom. 2-car attached garage with direct access offers a spacious laundry area and storage cabinets for surfboards and all your beach toys. The complex amenities include a well-maintained pool, spa, remodeled clubhouse with kitchen and sundeck, ample easy-access guest parking and a security guard-gated entrance to complete the resort experience. Live your Malibu dream lifestyle from this move-in ready, turn-key home!

Private Luxury Estate located in the private Mesa in upper Big Rock. 180 degree views from Pacific Palisades to the Ana Capa islands. This gorgeous, brand-new architectural estate was created by Amit Apel Design for a lifestyle of sophisticated indoor-outdoor living and entertaining. With breathtaking ocean and mountain views from every room and seamless flow from expansive interiors to resort-style decks and patios, this is a residence of exceptional privacy, beauty, and comfort. Located on approximately three-quarters of an acre across from Zuma Beach, with fabulous whitewater views, the gated property combines dramatic geometric forms with serene landscaping to create an ambiance of luxury and tranquility. In addition to dual primary suites, a guest wing, and enormous pocket doors, the home's remarkable details include elegant Italian cabinetry, oak flooring, custom Italian vanities, French plaster bathrooms and fireplaces, enormous indoor and outdoor kitchens with well-appointed appliances, and a whole-house smart control system. The main living area is an open pavilion comprising living, dining, and kitchen with exquisite ocean views and gracious flow to adjacent patios. The living room has a contemporary fireplace and a host's bar with beverage cooler and wine storage. The kitchen is sleek and sensational, with professional appliances, a large island with bar seating, and a built-in breakfast/lunch dining nook with wraparound windows and an atrium skylight. From this central living area, vanishing glass doors open onto a huge entertainer's deck, complete with a full outdoor kitchen, a partially covered dining area, an outdoor living room with a firepit, a beautiful Pebble Tec pool and Jacuzzi, plus several additional lounging and seating areas and another firepit. Also on the home's main floor are two en-suite bedrooms, one currently serving as a gym, plus an elegant powder room. On the upper level, there is a play area and family room, a laundry, and four ocean-view bedroom suites. Two of these are enormous owners' suites, with fireplace, seating area, walk-in closet, gorgeous spa-style bathrooms, and private decks. One features an atrium with a retractable star-gazer's skylight and the other is currently set up as a private office. Complete with three-zone air conditioning, a three-car garage with electric charger, and parking for a dozen guest vehicles, this new estate represents the pinnacle of contemporary Malibu living.

Equipped with security, air conditioning, and solar power, this is Malibu beach living at its most charming.

Incredibly updated Paradise Cove Beach House with extreme attention to detail and designer touches throughout. Built in 2015 with a contemporary design composed of rusted corrugated metal and smooth stucco. This sensational, award-winning, single-level Malibu estate offers extravagant comfort and commands unobstructed sunrise-to-sunset ocean and island views. Set on approximately one acre with 133' of bluff-top frontage, it is one of just 17 homes that comprise the very private 80-acre MariSol community. Designed by Barry Berkus, A.I.A., the home won the Gold Nugget Award for Home of the Year at the Pacific Coast Builders Conference. Meticulously maintained and updated, it is characterized by Berkus's contemporary design aesthetic, flawless integration of indoor and outdoor spaces, and exceptional attention to sustainable design principles and materials. The project earned a Build It Green certification for its use of recycled materials, certified lumber, high-efficiency glass, efficient water usage, and large overhangs for shading. Surrounded by a botanical wonderland of gorgeous trees, feathery ferns, meandering pathways, and inviting outdoor living spaces, the home sits behind gates at the end of a driveway of cobblestone hand-hewn from native rock. The entry area features a deep portico and a large rectangular pond. With interior spaces defined by rift-sawn oak ceilings, skylights, Fleetwood windows and doors, Berkus's signature huge, moving glass walls, and French limestone floors, the home's primary living area is a vast, 60-foot wide great room with 14-foot ceilings. This luminous ocean-view space incorporates open-plan living, dining, and kitchen areas and flows out to a tranquil patio facing the infinity pool and non-stop views. The living room has a wide fireplace and a step-down wet bar complete with marble countertops, two beer coolers with taps, dishwasher, ice maker, and a large pass-through window that opens onto the central patio. The double-island gourmet kitchen is equipped with Wolfe and Miele appliances, beautiful custom cabinets, bar seating, a walk-in pantry, and a breakfast area that also opens to the patio. Off the foyer is a spacious home theatre with an automated screen, blackout curtains, and a kitchenette. Adjacent to this is a large temperature-controlled wine room. The home has been thoughtfully designed with dual owners suites in separate wings for comfort and privacy. Each of these is a gorgeous retreat with pool and ocean views, very high wood ceilings, fireplace with a sitting area, custom closets, luxurious spa-style bath, and a door to the back patio. There are three additional bedrooms in one wing and one additional bedroom in the other. The central patio, off the living/dining/bar/kitchen area, opens onto an enormous outdoor living/dining pavilion with a huge fireplace, a spacious dining area, and a barbecue island. Beyond this is a wide lawn flanking the pool and spa, plus a landscaped slope with steps down to a bluff-top private beach with deck seating for entertaining, whale watching, and stargazing. In addition to the rare Brazilian slate roof tiles and extensive smart-home electronics, the property has a three-car garage plus ample guest parking. Private, quiet, and majestically sited, this MariSol estate is ideally designed for a lifestyle of understated luxury and sophisticated entertaining.

Gated and exceedingly private, the home's walls of glass and generous patios, courtyards, and decks provide seamless flow for lavish entertaining and sparkling vistas of shoreline, ocean, islands, and sky. Just outside is a gorgeous beachfront patio complete with a covered dining area, outdoor kitchen and barbecue, pool, Jacuzzi, a large outdoor living room, and private steps to the sand. A pass-through window opens to the ocean-view kitchen, which is equipped for the professional chef with top-grade appliances, island with bar seating, and a walk-in pantry. On the upper floor, the all-en-suite bedrooms include a serene primary suite with stunning views, a sitting area/office, a view balcony, walk-in closet, and luxurious bath. Topping this magnificent residence is an enormous roof deck that is accessed through dramatic retractable glass roof. For entertaining, lounging, or star-gazing, this resplendent space is equipped with a wet bar with seating, barbecue, fire pit, dining area, Jacuzzi, and exquisite views. The residence has many additional smart-home features, including an automotive turntable in the driveway. With an exterior distinguished by soaring walls of sweeping bird-wing curves and an interior of harmonious beauty, this inspired Carbon Beach estate has graced magazine covers and won awards for its thoughtful renovation. It is a legacy of contemporary design.

Here, in addition to the primary suite and two other bedrooms, there is a luxurious apartment complete with living room, fireplace, kitchenette, full bath, and separate entrance with a balcony just outside. Ascend one more flight to reach the third-floor sunroom and approximately 2000 square foot rooftop deck, where unobstructed views take in the ocean, coastline, and protected landscape of the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area. This living/dining/lounging area is fully equipped with a fire pit and outdoor kitchen for incomparable day and evening gatherings. An estate of rare quality and value, with a protective sea wall and dramatic grandeur, the property offers easy access to the Camarillo Airport, Pepperdine University, central Malibu, and all the luxuries of California coastal living. text: Extremely rare blufftop contemporary on the market for the first time in 50 years. Very private and set above beautiful Dume Cove at the end of a long drive, this nearly one-acre garden property commands sweeping views of ocean, islands, and coastline. Mature trees, vast wraparound lawns, and manicured gardens offer an idyllic oceanfront setting for outdoor entertaining and recreation. The home's comfortable, open-concept interior features a triangular, double-height entry, high ceilings, gallery walls, large windows, and hardwood floors. In the ocean-view living/dining room, there is a wall of library bookshelves to the ceiling, a woodburning fireplace with a recessed wood-storage area below the tiled hearth, plus a built-in bench and corner reading area with full-height windows on two sides. In the dining area, additional windows and doors open to the backyard and a covered flagstone patio for al fresco dining and entertaining. Nearby, the kitchen has butcher-block countertops with corner windows facing onto the covered patio and ocean, plus a Wolf range and tiled wall and floor. The home's strong architectural lines carry upward to the second floor, with an angled wall of windows, another floor-to-ceiling bookcase, and the tranquil bedroom suite, with huge, sliding ocean-view windows on three sides. In addition to a two-car garage, the front of the property has a huge lawn with ample space for large gatherings. This wraps around to a flagstone patio at the side of the house and into the stunning, ocean-facing backyard, where a path leads to a bench for whale watching and star gazing, plus steps that lead down to the pristine white sands of Dume Cove. Quiet and private, this is truly a Point Dume gem.

An idyllic mid-century retreat on the best section of La Costa Beach. Never before listed for sale, this was the Malibu beach home of legendary composer Henry Mancini. The property is perfectly situated on a deep, sandy section of beach far from public access and features breathtaking ocean views from Point Dume and the Malibu Pier all the way to the sparkling Queen's Necklace. Enter through a spacious courtyard with a seating area and gas fire pit surrounded by lush, mature landscaping. Inside, the ocean views are seemingly endless and the home is flooded with beautiful natural light and gentle sea breeze. The living room fronts the beach and boasts a marble fireplace, built-in TV, and sliding doors leading out onto the oceanfront deck and private beach access. The dining area features a built-in seating area overlooking the sand and surf and leads into the kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Viking dual ovens, and a breakfast bar. Upstairs, the primary bedroom enjoys beautiful views, vaulted wood-beamed ceilings, access to an outdoor deck, and an en-suite bathroom with a marble shower/soaking tub and bidet. There is a second oceanfront bedroom with deck access and an additional bedroom and full bathroom on the second floor. On the entry level, there is a fourth bedroom currently set up as an office. Other features include a 2-car garage and driveway that could fit an additional 2 cars. This special property served as home and inspiration to the musician who created countless hits and movie scores, including Academy Award-winning Moon River from Breakfast at Tiffany's and the iconic Pink Panther theme. This is a rare opportunity to own a beautiful piece of history!

The upper level features 4 bedroom suites including the magnificent master suite complete with fireplace, luxurious bathroom, custom large walk-in closets, and private terrace overlooking the stunning ocean views. Staff quarters with kitchen are located off the three-car garage, while above the garage there are two guest bedroom suites, each with lovely bathrooms and terraces, and one with a kitchenette. The second detached guesthouse located adjacent to the tennis court features a living room, bedroom, three bathrooms, and a large upper level with vaulted ceilings currently used as a gym, ballet and yoga studio. This exceptional oceanfront compound offers the ultimate resort lifestyle located on one of the most incredible bluffs and beaches in the world.
